tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (DT Some) (JJ tiny) (NNS details)) (VP (VBP give) (NP (PRP us)) (NP (NN happiness) (JJR more)) (SBAR (IN than) (S (NP (PRP we)) (VP (VBP expect))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [give/VBP nsubj>[details/NNS det>Some/DT amod>tiny/JJ] iobj>us/PRP dobj>[more/JJR dep>happiness/NN] advcl>[expect/VBP mark>than/IN nsubj>we/PRP] punct>./.]
